author: Josh Duboff
title: The Best 2017 Oscar After-Party Transformations Photos | Vanity Fair
text: Josh Duboff For many of Sunday night’s Academy Award nominees, the end of the Oscars is just the beginning of the night. Off to the after-parties they go, often times in a completely different outfit than the one they were wearing for the ceremony itself. Behold, the night’s most fantastic dress transformations—from the Oscars to the Vanity Fair Oscar party afterward. Read More
